name: Huvepharma
membership: Huvepharma is a member of AnimalHealthEurope and FEFANA at EU level, together with several national federations
goal: Research, development, marketing and distribution of veterinary medicines, veterinary vaccines, feed additives, biocides and pharmaceutical active substances
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: legislation on medicines, veterinary medicines, medicated feed, animal health law, feed and feed additives
